node.description: Fans were surprised to learn that Neena Makurano of Production Kawaii—who was originally set to graduate on August 2nd—has had her contract terminated by the agency on June 3rd.

node.title: PRISM Project’s Rita Kamishiro Held Successful Fundraiser for Mental Health Awareness Month

node.description: The Gate’s Wide Open, and You’re Invited. What you are about to read is an improved version of his story pitch when he applied to be part of the VTuber Section.
